title: Luca Accounting Platform
summary: AI-powered multi-tenant accounting SaaS with natural language queries, full double-entry bookkeeping, and automated financial reporting
description:
Luca is a full-stack accounting platform for SMBs that combines traditional bookkeeping with AI-powered insights.

**What it does:**
- Multi-company workspaces with team collaboration and role-based access
- Full double-entry accounting: chart of accounts, journal entries, general ledger
- Financial reports: P&L, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow, expense breakdowns
- Sales & purchasing: quotes, invoices, payments, vendor management
- Inventory with batch tracking, price lists, and stock valuation
- Bank reconciliation and payment tracking
- Fixed asset management with automated depreciation
- Tax compliance including VAT and GSTR-1 reporting

**AI Integration:**
- Chat interface for asking questions about your finances in plain English
- LLM-friendly API endpoints that let the AI understand accounting context
- Natural language queries that translate to real financial insights

**Technical Highlights:**
- Next.js 15 with React 19 and Server Components
- Node.js/Express backend with PostgreSQL and Sequelize
- Supabase Auth with JWT tokens and role-based access
- 46+ database models, 40+ API route modules
- Real-time updates and responsive design
- Production-ready security: rate limiting, input validation, audit logging
